content: The tranquility of the lagoon has a relaxing effect on the mind and soul, making it an ideal place for an escape from the frenzy of daily life.
translations: ita:La tranquillit√† della laguna ha un effetto rilassante sulla mente e sull'anima, rendendola il luogo ideale per una fuga
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Miktsoanit (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
